titleStmt.title: (Copy of) report to the archive concerning temple documents that have been sent

revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: To Zoilos, official of the archive of the Arsinoite (nome), from Orsenouphis, son of Horos and presbyter of the priests of Soknobraisis, the great god of the village of Bakchias. I have handed in for registration, to you, a list of priests and inventories of the temple for the current year, which is the 7th year of the Imperatores Caesares Augusti, Lucius Septimius Severus Pius Pertinax Arabicus Adiabenicus Parthicus Maximus and Marcus Aurelius Antoninus.; (2nd hand:) I, Zoilos, official of the archive, have signed.

listBibl.bibl: P.Bacch. 12 SB VI 9332 P.Lund. III 1 BL III, 104; BL VIII, 343 (lines 8, 12, 18); X, 197; TM 14150; Wilcken, U., Archiv für Papyrusforschung 13 (1939) p. 233; Hombert, M., Chronique d'Égypt 14, 1939, p. 400-401; Schmidt, K. F. W., Philologische Wochenschrift (Jahrgang) 60 (No 45/48), 1940, c. 608-611; van Groningen, B. A., Museum, Maandblad voor Philologie en Geschiedenis, 47, 1940, c. 168; N. E. Göran Lövestan & Erik Swietlicki, Pixe analysis and imaging of papyrus documents, section IV. Proton-induced X-ray and gamma-ray emission, Nuclear instruments and methods in physics research B 45 1990, p. 307-310
